resources.string:
Welcome To KahIt! 
KahIt is a quiz-game app that developed by 5 IT students of Chalmers university.

 How to play: 

First you need to choose between host, join or hotswap game.

 To Host 
You need to fill in your info and create a game then let other players join you.

 To Join 
You need to fill in your info and join a game.

 To use HotSwap 
Hotswap is a mode where many players can play on the same phone. Every player has its own turn to answer the question and the result will be shown at the end of every question.

 When the game starts: 
You have many rounds that have 2 questions in each. After each round you are will get a randomized item(Buff or Debuff) of the wheel of fortune(i.e lottery).
 Debuffs are the items that the player can send to other players and negatively affect them.
 While Buffs are the items that players positively can affect themselves.
 On the other hand, players can buy those items from the store. Store cart is always available during the game.

 Note that the items are shared with all players, that means when any player buys an item, it is no longer available for any other player. Be quick!
 Vanity item is a picture you can buy to change your own profile picture.
 After the game has finished, score page will show up.

 Good luck and remember, be quick!
 Best regards,
 /KahIt team.
An error has occurred when attempting to connect to the database. Please restart the application to retry the connection. Local data will be used if present.
The connection to the database has been regained
All players must be ready to start the game
